Key Match Events: Kolo Muani applied the finish after Dembele's mishit shot was pushed out by Belgian goalkeeper Koen Casteels
Dembele skipped inside from the right wing before blasting a shot into the net on his left foot
Pre-Game Insights: Deschamps made eight changes to the starting lineup
Captain Kylian Mbappe dropped out of the starting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: Deschamps expressed happiness with the team's reaction and performance
Deschamps acknowledged that the team's performance against Italy was not the worst and that everything has not been fixed
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Parc Olympique Lyonnais in Lyon
Italy is on top of Group A2 with six points out of six after beating Israel 2-1
